summary: Diff removes waveform usage from AudioRecorder and implements a live RMS-based level meter update loop via Web Audio AnalyserNode with requestAnimationFrame, including AudioContext resume for Safari/iOS. However, it also introduces an unrequested `isPaused` recording state and updates project_state.json with new feature request entries that were not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced `isPaused` state in the audio recording hook/interface (implying pause-related API surface) despite pause being a stated non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists adding new recording features like pause as a non-goal; diff shows `isPaused` added to `AudioRecordingState`.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added tracking entries in `project_state.json` (AR-1..AR-4) marking feature requests as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project tracking metadata; this is extra scope beyond UI/hook changes.
